text: It's quite a small DFS Duty Free shop, located right by the departure gates of Harborfront Cruise Centre. You can get alcohol, beauty products, and chocolates, at duty free prices, before you embark your ferry. But that said, there's not much choice given the size of this shop. Don't bank on it.
It was very hot when last visit here, the AirCon may not be able to support when the outside temperature is too high and there are too many people here.

I took a cruise of Dream cruise Genting Dream from here. The cruise terminal is huge and user friendly. The baggage drop is right near the coach parking. From there we have to proceed to security and check in. It is usually very crowded during the boarding hours.

DFS venture - HBF DEPARTURE
VERIFY YOUR BILL AS THEY WILL CHARGE YOU EXTRA ... IE NOT THE PRICE INDICATED ON LABEL
THEN WHEN YOU CORRECT THEM ON PAYMENT TERMINAL, IT IS STILL HIGHER .. SO YOU ALSO NEED TO VERIFY YOUR RECEIPT !
I RETURNED MY ITEM AS THIS IS FRAUDULENT BEHAVIOR
IT WAS ON CHOCOLATE SIDE BY THE WAY
Ridiculous staff on 12 August evening. Left the cashier empty for so long when there’s a long queue, and it’s only a small shop, what excuse can you have, no one was attending to customers
